import React from 'react' import Shopbag from '../Icons/Shopbag' import Person from '../Icons/Person' import classes from "../../css/userpanel.module.css" import { useState } from 'react' import Overlay from '../overlay/Overlay' import { useContext } from 'react' import ShopContext from '../../shop-context' import products from '../../assets/products' import Close from '../Icons/Close' import Item from '../overlay/Item' function UserPanel(props) { const[showBag, setShowBag] = useState(false) const shopContext = useContext(ShopContext) const controlUserBag=()=>{ showBag? setShowBag(false): setShowBag(true) } const close = ()=>{ setShowBag(false) } return (
